name: Mercenaries
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Combat Shield (Bash (A1), Shielded)

gains.name: Master Sniper Rifle
gains.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

options.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

sections.label: Take one Master Heavy Rifle attachment

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Hand Weapon (A2)
Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Combat Shield (Bash (A1), Shielded)
Twin Heavy Pistol (12", A2, AP(1)), Knife (A1)

gains.name: Heavy Flamer
gains.label: Heavy Flamer (12", A1, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)

options.label: Heavy Flamer (12", A1, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)

spells.name: Psy-Injected Courage
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get +1 to morale test rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? this.getMoraleCost({ ...unit, quality: Math.max(1, unit.quality - params.effect.rollModifier.value) }) - this.getMoraleCost(unit) : 0

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getMoraleCost({ quality: 5 - params.effect.rollModifier.value }) - this.getMoraleCost({ quality: 5 })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Electric Tempest
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Surge. Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

parameters.name: spellHitRoll
parameters.value: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spellHitRoll.name: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spells.name: Calculated Foresight
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Relentless against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (this._skirmish ? 1 : this.AuraSize), avgUnit: true }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Searing Burst
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 3 hits each.

spells.name: Shock Speed
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which moves +2" when using Advance actions and +4" when using Rush/Charge actions once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? this.getSpeed(unit, { advance: params.effect.advanceSpeed.value, rush: params.effect.rushSpeed.value }) : 0

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getSpeed(this.AverageUnit, { advance: params.effect.advanceSpeed.value, rush: params.effect.rushSpeed.value })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Expel Threat
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy models within 18", which take 2 hits with AP(1) each.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Piercing Hunter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Piercing Hunter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Battle-Hardened
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to morale test rolls.

specialRules.name: Piercing Assault Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Piercing Assault. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Increased Shooting Range Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get +6" range when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Regeneration Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Regeneration. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Piercing Hunter
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, its weapons get AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Piercing Assault
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+1) when charging.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).
